description.en: Lil' Potato follows his owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: Lil' Potato follows his owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: Uma pequena e fofa batatinha que segue seu dono e recolhe itens caídos.
description.cns: 捡宠，召唤时会自动拾取周围道具。
description.de: Eine niedliche Kartoffel, die dir überallhin folgt und Gegenstände für dich aufhebt.
description.fi: Lil' Potato follows his owner around and picks up dropped items.

description.fr: Une petite patate toute douce qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les monstres.
description.id: Lil' Potato yang setia mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: Lil' Potato follows his owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: リルポテトくんは落としたアイテムを拾ってくれます。

description.sp: Patatita sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.

description.tw: Gpotato圈跟隨著它的主人四處走走並撿起掉落的道具。
